0010. INT. - NIGHTMARE - RAILCAR - EVENING/NIGHT

window, reading a book. The monotonous clatter of the train

through the empty hallway. The train goes into a tunnel. The
hallway is dark. He goes in to the bathroom. He washes his
hands while whistling.

Suddenly, a little boy appears in the background. The boy
wears breeches and a shirt, stands in the bathtub and stares
Ruben in the face.

WHISTLING BOY, 8), holding a snail, is sitting in front of
him, stares straight into his eyes while whistling.

(VELAZQUEZ'S INFANTA MARGARITA, 7), is hanging outside the
railcar.

RUBEN BRANDT

window. She screams for help.

pulls him out of the train.

he notices the approaching lights of a locomotive on the
opposite track. Ruben screams.
